description:
Downsized for little rippers, these insulated pants are great for snow days, resort days, and any other cold weather adventures. A tough 2-layer recycled polyester shell stands up to abrasion from crusty snow or branches, and the DWR treatment keeps the droplets beading and prevents saturation. Inside, a soft taffeta lining manages moisture and glides smoothly over underlayers.

  • Durable 2-layer polyester H2No® breathable membrane with a PFC-free DWR finish to keep you dry
  • Insulated with Thermogreen® recycled polyester, tailored thicknesses promote easy movement
  • Waist has a brushed lining to wick moisture, and adjustable elastic tabs to customize the fit. 2-snap closure and zip fly
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees improve mobility and reduce bulk
  • Gaiters keep the snow out, while tough scuff guards protect the inside of the leg and bottom hem
  • Grow-fit lets you unstitch extra liner and insulation to gain an extra 5cm (2in.) of length
name: Patagonia Powder Town Pants - Youths
